title: Katie Price targeted by vicious trolls who mocked her 'droopy' and 'lop-sided' face

Katie Price has been cruelly trolled by some of her followers for her apperance.

The former glamour model, 41, posed for a photo wit Flex FM's Rick Live after chatting with him on the air, and some reckon her face doesn't look right.

One asked, "What's wrong with your eye?", while another told Katie her "eyes look a bit weird."

Another said: "Couple of questions @officialkatieprice.....A) what is going on with your eyes B) did you forget to get dressed?"

A fourth decided to attack Katie over her recent driving ban.

They wrote: "How's the driving?? Oops you can't drive for TWO years."

(Image: officialkatieprice/Instagram)

(Image: officialkatieprice/Instagram)

Other fans, though, offered kind words and supported the mum of five.

One offered: "You look beautiful," with a heart emoji.

Another gushed: "Love you so much! Can't wait for the new eps of your crazy life! U my gal."

(Image: Instagram)

During the interview, Katie dished that she's hoping to walk down the aisle next year.

She's also got another baby on her mind after he recent reunion with ex-fiance and toyboy Kris Boyson.

Katie laughed: "Next year maybe a baby and a wedding."

A source told The Sun Online that Katie and Kris were back on after she dumped him by text to party with now ex Charles Drury.

The source said: "He's taken her back and they're already moving some of his things back into the house.

"They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back being loved-up again like they never split up."
description: Katie was attacked online, with trolls taking swipes at her appearance as she posed for a photo after a recent radio interview
